data.name: NeuroNet: Mendax Proxy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Dedicated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

Recommended:
